thread.section_title: Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent in every regard
thread.title_full: Excellent in every regard - Review of Taj 51 Buckingham Gate Suites and Residences, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Caroline A
title: Excellent in every regard
text: I stayed here for one night to attend a seminar for work. I had booked a double room in the St James Court Hotel which is a sister to Taj51 and was upgraded on arrival. Ended up in a top floor suite which was just stunning. Staff were solicitous and helpful without exception and I would not hesitate to recommend to others. I sincerely hope I'll be staying here again very soon.
